success.description: Whether the API call was successful

ha_link.description: mark true to use this LAN for HA probing. only works for site with HA turned on. only one LAN can be set as the ha_link.

static_prefix.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.
A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

prefix.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

static_addressing.description: If the site is not configured in high availability mode, this configuration is optional (if omitted, use DHCP). However, if in high availability mode, static_address is required along with secondary and virtual address.

address.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

additionalProperties.description: IP address associated with the MAC address

reservations.description: Mapping of MAC addresses to IP addresses

secondary_address.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

virtual_address.description: A valid CIDR notation representing an IP range.

vlan_tag.description: VLAN ID. Use zero for untagged.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
